name: Watercress, Fennel And Romaine Salad With Pernod Dressing
recipeIngredient: 2 large heads romaine lettuce, torn into small pieces (about 8 cups)
3 heads fennel, tops removed and thinly sliced across the bulb (about 6 cups)

recipeInstructions.text: Wash the greens well, then dry them. Refrigerate in a large plastic bag, undried, if preparing ahead.
Whisk together the dressing ingredients. Just before serving, place the greens in one or two large salad bowls. Divide the dressing evenly between the bowls. Toss well to combine.
